def are_polygons_similar(n, vertices):
    if n % 2 == 0:
        return 'NO'
    a = [0] * n
    (x1, y1) = vertices[0]
    (x11, y11) = (x1, y1)
    for i in range(1, n):
        (x2, y2) = vertices[i]
        a[i - 1] = [x2 - x1, y2 - y1]
        (x1, y1) = (x2, y2)
    a[n - 1] = [x11 - x2, y11 - y2]
    fl = True
    for i in range(n // 2):
        if not (a[i][0] == -a[n // 2 + i][0] and a[i][1] == -a[n // 2 + i][1]):
            fl = False
            break
    return 'YES' if fl else 'NO'
